ApplyLivenessToken.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: faceid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyLivenessToken
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SecureLevel": "1"
}
ApplyLivenessToken.title: Applying for a token

ApplySdkVerificationToken.document: This example shows you how to apply for a verification token.
ApplySdkVerificationToken.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: faceid.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplySdkVerificationToken
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CheckMode": 1,
    "SecurityLevel": 4,
    "NeedVerifyIdCard": true,
    "Extra": "fewfewf",
    "IdCardType": "HK"
}
ApplySdkVerificationToken.title: Applying for a token
